Class ControllerImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • ControllerImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Controller
    public class ControllerImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements Controller
    This class implements the Controller interface. It has two main fields of objects of classes Model,View. This class tells the model to perform calculations, store results and this class tells the view to display certain information.

      • addPortfolioData

        public void addPortfolioData​(java.util.List<java.util.List<java.lang.String>> dataToAdd,
                             java.lang.String name,
                             java.lang.String currentDate)
        Description copied from interface: Controller
        This function takes in a list of lists of strings, a string, and a string, and adds the data to the portfolio.
        Specified by:
        addPortfolioData in interface Controller
        Parameters:
        dataToAdd - A list of lists of strings. Each list of strings represents a row of data . The first string in the list is name of company, the second string is the number of shares, and the third string is the date.
        name - The name of the portfolio you want to add data to.
        currentDate - The date of the data you are adding.

      • handleShowPortfolio

        public void handleShowPortfolio()
        Description copied from interface: Controller
        This method asks the model ModelImpl.getListOfPortfolio() to give it an array of strings of all the files in the src\\portfolios\\ directory. Then it tells the view View.displayPortfolioName(String) to display the portfolio name.
